text: The Oil and Gas Discovery Centre (OGDC; ) is a science centre in Seria, Belait District, Brunei. ==History== The centre was officiated by Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah on 14 September 2002. ==Architecture== The centre consists of the main gallery, basketball court, beach soccer pit, big top, classroom, conference room, playground, science lab and theater. ==See also== * Tourism in Brunei ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 establishments in Brunei Category:Buildings and structures in Brunei Category:Science and technology in Brunei Category:Scientific organisations based in Brunei
title: Oil and Gas Discovery Centre
